backend/main.mo: Defines the canister’s product, update, contact, user, and logo types with access control, single-admin enforcement, and APIs for managing profiles, products, updates, contacts, and admin queries.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that maps old actor state to the new actor format by removing deprecated admin fields while preserving data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the single-admin UI update to its affected frontend file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files, describing their purpose and functionality across the app and admin interface.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Documentation explaining how to configure DNS and connect a custom domain to the deployed Internet Computer canister.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/CSS file defining fonts, color variables, themes, and utility classes such as honeycomb backgrounds.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the router with all public and admin routes, enforcing admin and owner-only guards for protected pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component that checks Internet Identity authentication and admin permissions, showing login or access-denied UI when needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerOnlyR: Route guard that checks Internet Identity auth and owner status, showing login or access-denied UI before rendering children for the owner.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for auth state, errors, and react-query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Reusable brand-styled layout primitives including Section, Container, Card, Badge, and Button wrappers.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, social links, quick links, and a newsletter form with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation, custom logo loading, admin link handling, login button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level layout rendering header, footer, routed content, and global toaster over a background pattern.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Card showing a product update with type badge, date, title, and preview text, linking to the update detail page.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Displays formatted pricing with optional discount, original price, and size-based styling.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product listing card showing image, name, availability, description, and price, linking to the product detail page.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Disabled add-to-cart button with alert indicating checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Renders weight or flavor variant selection UI and notifies parent on selection changes, initializing with the first variant.
frontend/src/config/owner.ts: Defines the owner principal string and provides a helper to check if a given principal matches it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns shared react-query settings for periodic refetching and window-focus updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and meta description based on provided page metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for fetching and mutating products and related backend resources using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-imports the root index.css file for global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with story, beekeeping philosophy, and brand imagery, setting appropriate page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAccessPage: Provides single‑admin access info, lists admin principals, and supports copying principal IDs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard linking to product, news, and logo management sections with identity‑based owner check.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogoPage.t: Admin page for uploading and validating a site logo with preview, file checks, and update mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Admin interface to create, list, sort, and delete product news updates with dialogs and product selection.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Full admin dashboard for creating, editing, filtering, and deleting products with variant management and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Renders certifications and quality-assurance information with images and sections, setting page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, mutation-based submission, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section and product highlights with navigation to the products page.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single news update, including metadata, message, date, and related product info.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Lists news updates with tab filtering by update type and displays sorted update cards.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy content with sections outlining data collection and usage.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info, variant selection, availability, and related updates using product queries and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows a category‑filterable product list with tabs, loading states, and last‑updated timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the site's terms and conditions with structured sections and page metadata.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Utility to encode filenames in asset URLs while preserving path segments.
frontend/src/utils/logo.ts: Converts logo byte data to object URLs and safely revokes them to free resources.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Helpers for INR price formatting, discount calculations, and structured price display data.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Validates and formats Dfinity principals, preventing anonymous principals and allowing truncated display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, current features, and pending requests for enforcing single-admin mode tied to a specific Internet Identity principal.
